name: bbn\Appui\Option\Internal\Manip

export.name: export

exportDb.name: exportDb
exportDb.summary: Converts an option or a hierarchy to a multi-level array with JSON values
exportDb.description: If $return is false the resulting array will be printed

description_parts.content: If $return is false the resulting array will be printed

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the option to clone

arguments.name: deep
arguments.description: If set to true children will be included

arguments.name: return
arguments.description: If set to true the resulting array will be returned

doc.description:
Converts an option or a hierarchy to a multi-level array with JSON values
If $return is false the resulting array will be printed

```php
```

params.name: $id
params.description: The ID of the option to clone

params.name: $deep
params.description: If set to true children will be included

params.name: $return
params.description: If set to true the resulting array will be returned

exportDb.comments:
/**
   * Converts an option or a hierarchy to a multi-level array with JSON values
   * If $return is false the resulting array will be printed
   *
   * ```php
   * ```
   *
   * @todo Example output
   * @param int     $id     The ID of the option to clone
   * @param boolean $deep   If set to true children will be included
   * @param boolean $return If set to true the resulting array will be returned
   * @return array|string|null
   */

importAll.name: importAll

import.name: import
import.summary: Insert into the option table an exported array of options

arguments.name: options
arguments.description: An array of option(s) as export returns it

arguments.name: id_parent
arguments.description: parent The option target, if not specified {@link default}

arguments.name: no_alias
arguments.description: alias If set to true, aliases values won't be set

doc.description:
Insert into the option table an exported array of options

```php
```

params.name: $options
params.description: An array of option(s) as export returns it

params.name: $id
params.description: parent The option target, if not specified {@link default}

params.name: $no
params.description: alias If set to true, aliases values won't be set

import.comments:
/**
   * Insert into the option table an exported array of options
   *
   * ```php
   * ```
   *
   * @todo Usage example
   * @param array    $options   An array of option(s) as export returns it
   * @param array|string|int|null $id_parent The option target, if not specified {@link default}
   * @param bool $no_alias If set to true, aliases values won't be set
   * @param array|null $todo
   * @return iterable|null
   */

duplicate.name: duplicate
duplicate.summary: Copies and insert an option into a target option

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The source option's ID

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: The destination option's ID

arguments.name: deep
arguments.description: If set to true, children will also be duplicated

arguments.name: force
arguments.description: If set to true and option exists it will be merged

arguments.name: returnId
arguments.description: d If set to true, the ID of the duplicated option will be returned

doc.description:
Copies and insert an option into a target option

```php
```

params.name: $id
params.description: The source option's ID

params.name: $target
params.description: The destination option's ID

params.name: $deep
params.description: If set to true, children will also be duplicated

params.name: $force
params.description: If set to true and option exists it will be merged

params.name: $return
params.description: d If set to true, the ID of the duplicated option will be returned

doc.return: The number of affected rows or null if option not found

duplicate.comments:
/**
   * Copies and insert an option into a target option
   *
   * ```php
   * ```
   *
   * @todo Usage example
   * @param int|string  $id     The source option's ID
   * @param int|string  $target The destination option's ID
   * @param boolean     $deep   If set to true, children will also be duplicated
   * @param boolean     $force  If set to true and option exists it will be merged
   * @param boolean     $returnId If set to true, the ID of the duplicated option will be returned
   * @return int|null The number of affected rows or null if option not found
   */

apply.name: apply
apply.summary: Applies a function to children of an option and updates the database

arguments.name: f
arguments.description: The function to apply (the unique argument will be the option as in {@link option()}

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The options' ID on which children the function should be applied

arguments.name: deep
arguments.description: If set to true the function will be applied to all children's levels

arguments.name: force
arguments.description: If set to true it will update the row in db without checking with $originals

doc.description:
Applies a function to children of an option and updates the database

```php
```

params.name: $f
params.description: The function to apply (the unique argument will be the option as in {@link option()}

params.name: $id
params.description: The options' ID on which children the function should be applied

params.name: $deep
params.description: If set to true the function will be applied to all children's levels

params.name: $force
params.description: If set to true it will update the row in db without checking with $originals

doc.return: The number of affected rows or null if option not found

apply.comments:
/**
   * Applies a function to children of an option and updates the database
   *
   * ```php
   * ```
   *
   * @todo Usage example
   * @param callable  $f    The function to apply (the unique argument will be the option as in {@link option()}
   * @param int|array $id   The options' ID on which children the function should be applied
   * @param boolean   $deep If set to true the function will be applied to all children's levels
   * @param boolean   $force If set to true it will update the row in db without checking with $originals
   * @return int|null The number of affected rows or null if option not found
   */

map.name: map

arguments.name: f
arguments.description: The function to apply (the unique argument will be the option as in {@link option()}

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The options' ID on which children the function should be applied

arguments.name: deep
arguments.description: If set to true the function will be applied to all children's levels

doc.description:
Applies a function to children of an option

```php
```

params.name: $f
params.description: The function to apply (the unique argument will be the option as in {@link option()}

params.name: $id
params.description: The options' ID on which children the function should be applied

params.name: $deep
params.description: If set to true the function will be applied to all children's levels

doc.return: The new array with the function applied

map.comments:
/**
   * Applies a function to children of an option
   *
   * ```php
   * ```

   * @todo Usage example
   * @param callable  $f    The function to apply (the unique argument will be the option as in {@link option()}

   * @param boolean|int   $deep If set to true the function will be applied to all children's levels
   * @return array The new array with the function applied
   */

/**
   * Insert into the option table an exported array of options

/**
   * Copies and insert an option into a target option

   * ```php
   * ```

   * @return int|null The number of affected rows or null if option not found
   */

/**
   * Applies a function to children of an option and updates the database

   * @param boolean   $force If set to true it will update the row in db without checking with $originals
